```{r}
#separating the green resources column into 5 columns 
climateData <- climateData %>% 
  separate(green_power_resources, into = c("energy1", "energy2", "energy3", "energy4", "energy5"), sep = ",")
View(climateData)
```
```{r}
climateData$wind <- apply(climateData, 1, function(x)as.integer(any(grep('Wind|Various',x))))
climateData$solar <- apply(climateData, 1, function(x)as.integer(any(grep('Solar|various',x))))



```
